FuncDef: The display mpls multicast-lsp protocol p2mp-te command displays information about P2MP LSPs.
CLIs: display mpls multicast-lsp protocol p2mp-te [ lsp-id <ingress-lsr-id> <session-id> <p2mp-id> <lsp-id-value> [ s2l-destination <s2l-destination-address> ] | [ outgoing-interface { <out-if-name> | <out-port-type> <out-port-num> } | incoming-interface { <in-if-name> | <in-port-type> <in-port-num> } ] ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the LSR ID.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the session ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 65535.

Specifies the P2MP ID.
The value is a hexadecimal integer ranging from 0 to FFFFFFFF.

Specifies the LSP ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 65535.

Displays information about a sub-LSP of a specified leaf node address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display mpls multicast-lsp protocol p2mp-te command displays information about a P2MP LSP through each node. The information helps you check whether P2MP sub-LSPs are established after you configure a P2MP TE tunnel.
If P2MP sub-LSPs are established successfully, information about a specific or all P2MP sub-LSPs is displayed, including information about leaf nodes.If no P2MP sub-LSP is established, no information about a P2MP sub-LSP is displayed.
